cause.description:
What does this mean? This means no more affermative action, this means no more quotas. This means everything should be based on merit, not on your race, sex, or various other ridiculous things that businesses and schools look for and what have you.
1. Everyone is equal in the eyes of the law
2. affermative action is bad because it gives people a boost to beat the system
cause.mission: make sure everyone is on a level playiong field in the world.
cause.name: Student for racial equality
